isis.stitle: BRAKE COMPONENTS: This Service Manual Section should be used for reference only. For more current service information on all components go to the Bendix website from the ISIS Suppliers menu and refer to the Service Data Sheets. - TWO WAY CONTROL VALVE (BENDIX TYPE TW-1) - REASSEMBLE

svcproc.title: REASSEMBLE
svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 38 for all item numbers in parentheses.

step1.para: Apply a small amount of Fleetrite EP2 Moly grease or equivalent to NLGI #2 multi-purpose lithium grease on the plunger (Item 6) and insert plunger return spring (Item 3) and plunger into the valve body. Plunger must move freely with only a slight drag due to grommet. Depress plunger and then release; plunger spring (Item 3) must return plunger.
Apply Fleetrite EP2 Moly grease or equivalent to NLGI #2 multi-purpose lithium grease to cap nut grommet and position grommet on cap nut.
Position valve and valve spring in valve body.
Install cap nut in valve body.
Position lever (Item 1) on top of plunger (Item 6) and align hole in lever with hole in body.
Install lever pin and stake edge of hole.
Install jam nut and button on push-pull type valve. Install bracket on remote control (cable-operated) type valve.
